content.rendered:
OmRx

ABOUT

OmRx is a visionary attempt to create a mobile app that could solve some of the biggest issues in healthcare faced by medical practitioners including patient record management, appointment management, referral tracking, etc. We managed to build an entire health management system inside a mobile app which connects the entire healthcare ecosystem keeping the doctor as the center of the ecosystem. We created and designed the workflow and the UI/UX design for the OmRx suite of mobile applications – this included individual apps for doctors, patients, pharmacists, lab technicians, and hospitals.

SCOPE

  • Branding
  • User Research
  • App UI/UX
  • Web UI/UX
  • Brand Communication
  • Visual Identity

INDUSTRY

  • MedTech - B2B/B2C

The
Thought Process

IDENTITY

Colour coding has been a major aspect of branding the OmRx suite of apps as the product had to scale into a huge feature set and multiple apps within a suite.

The circle in the OmRx logo represents the healthcare ecosystem and the fingerprint marks on the rims represent how each medical case is unique to itself. The center icon is kept dynamic to represent the app function within the suite.

CHALLENGES

An Entire EMR System
Inside An App Suite

01

One of our biggest challenges was solving for easy and seamless navigation.

02

Working with the tech team to figure out the various possibilities and challenges of implementation.

03

To enable a suitable appointment and communication system between doctors, patients, labs, and pharmacies.

04

Linking the entire suite to seamlessly function with each other.

USER PERSONAS

Figuring Out Gaps In The Market

Our team did a user persona research of 50-60 individuals, this ranged from doctors, lab technicians, hospital owners, and patients.

Vamshi Madan

26 • Years • Male • MBBS • Mumbai

PRACTICE HOURS

5-6 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Multiple

BEHAVIOUR

  • Commutes a lot between locations
  • Chats with patients on whatsapp
  • Makes hand-written prescriptions

PAIN POINTS

  • Less revenue
  • Lots of documents to manage
  • Managing patient queues

GOALS

Vamshi’s goals are to manage his multiple practice locations, streamlining the medical records of his patients that are all over the place. And driving more revenue to his practices.

Radhika Kumar

30 Years • Female • MBBS • Gurgaon

PRACTICE HOURS

6-8 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Single

BEHAVIOUR

  • Commutes a lot between locations
  • Chats with patients on whatsapp
  • Makes hand-written prescriptions
  • Doesn’t control his patient’s access to him

PAIN POINTS

  • Less revenue
  • Lots of documents to manage
  • Managing patient queues
  • Patients constantly messaging on whatsapp

GOALS

Radhika’s goals are to manage her patient queues effectively, streamlining the medical records of her patients that are all over the place. And driving more revenue to her practice.

Abhimanyu D

36 Years • Male • Lab Technician • Lucknow

PRACTICE HOURS

8 Hrs/day

PRACTICE LOCATION

Single

BEHAVIOUR

  • Reads the newspaper
  • Alert during operational hours

PAIN POINTS

  • Stressful work environment
  • Feels so busy
  • Not enough time with family
  • Messed up timelines of lab records

GOALS

To drive more business to his lab and to streamline lab records.

Ramesh R

40 Years • Male • IT Professional • Bangalore

PRACTICE HOURS

8 Hrs/day

BEHAVIOUR

  • Shops online
  • Exercises regularly
  • Regularly follows viral posts

PAIN POINTS

  • Medical records are all over the place
  • Hard to contact his doctor
  • Test reports don’t come on time

GOALS

To take care of his health, be in constant touch with his healthcare professional, and sort his medical records.

HI-FI PROTOTYPES

The homepage is broken down into cubicle systems. This enables scale and allows easy navigation.

Easy To Use & Scale

Connecting Doctors,
Patients, Labs, And Pharmacies

The app ensures seamless connectivity between the patient and his/her doctor, labs, and pharmacies via a simple chat system and smooth information exchange and storage.

Better Than Real Life

The appointment system is broken down into tokens and slot systems exactly how it works in real life.

The doctor can see all the patients waiting for him through the app.

Accounting Made Easy

The app can track all the accounting data for the doctor making it easy to have all records in one place.

Growing A Community

The OmRx app enables doctors to refer patients to one another based on their expertise and specialties. Thus, resulting in enhanced patient care and community growth.

Medical Reports On
Your Fingertips

Keep A Track Of Orders

It also enables sharing reports and orders between the doctor and OmRx app suite.

Connect With Doctors

The Connect app (for patients) helps patients to stay connected to their doctors. It enables a one-on-one interaction between the patient and the doctor through a chat interface.

Tokens & Slots

The patients can easily get their tokens and book a slot. This enabled less waiting time and a reduction in human dependence.

One Tap Away

The Connect app enables video calling between doctors and patients.

The patient can access all his records in one place.

Though the patient will get access to the doctor through text chat and video chat, the control would still be with the doctor.

As we created the suite, keeping the doctor as the center of the ecosystem.

No More Queues

Easy Access

The OmRx app enables the digitization of health data, accounting, and receptionist access across multiple practice locations. This allows the doctor to handle his hospital patients and personal clinic patients, and manage time better creating a healthy work-life balance along with enhanced patient care.

IMPACT

Changing
The System

In a very short time, over 3000 doctors joined the platform and the company was able to raise venture capital for their future build based on the UI design that we provided them.

Make The Move

LET'S COLLABORATE
